vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ῥάπ-ισμα [ᾰ], ατος, τό,
stroke, ἀνθράκων ῥαπίσμασι (Abresch ῥιπ-) [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 slap on the face, [NT]; in Latin form rhapismata, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__2 weal, [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: a blow with the palm of the hand, cuff, slap, strike Mk. 14:65; Jn. 18:22; 19:3*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: un golpe (con un palo) ; bofetada (con una mano)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 用棍或竿或鞭子擊打 (可 14:65)
1a) 中文聖經也譯成打耳光
2) 用手摑耳光
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 用棍或竿或鞭子击打 (可 14:65)
1a) 中文圣经也译成打耳光
2) 用手掴耳光
